definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: Every time we sit together talking, Ququ is open to speak his mind.
sentences.chinese: 每次我們坐在一起聊天的時候，蛐蛐總是暢所欲言。

sentences.english: When I come to Shengzhou, I always stay there.
sentences.chinese: 我每次來嵊舟，都會待在那裏。

sentences.english: She gives me a big smile every time she sees me.
sentences.chinese: 她每次看見我都衝我熱情地笑笑。

sentences.english: Each time experiment was performed, he would check and recheck the results obtained.
sentences.chinese: 每次做實驗時，他總是對所獲得的結果檢查兩遍。

sentences.english: Every time I call you, I got your administrative assistant.
sentences.chinese: 每次我給你打電話，都是你的助手接。

sentences.english: You have bees to thank every time you drizzle some honey into your tea.
sentences.chinese: 每次在茶中滴入蜂蜜時你都要感謝蜜蜂的饋贈。

sentences.english: First of all, it will only be a minute or two at a time, maybe once or twice a lecture.
sentences.chinese: 首先，每次只有一兩分鐘，一堂課最多不超過兩次。

sentences.english: On average, Habbos users spend about 39 minutes per visit to the site.
sentences.chinese: 平均來說，哈寶用戶每次花上39分鐘來瀏覽網站。

sentences.english: I still feel giddy and excited when he does this.
sentences.chinese: 每次他這樣做的時候，我依然心花怒放。

sentences.english: Each time a child follows through with a task, he receives a sticker.
sentences.chinese: 每次孩子按照指示做完家務，他都會得到一個貼紙。

sentences.english: The glass also must be cleaned after each scan.
sentences.chinese: 每次掃描後，還得清理玻璃板。

sentences.english: He hates cartoons, so every time he sees them he .
sentences.chinese: 他討厭動畫片，所以每次看見了他都轉檯。

sentences.english: Each time he returned and stabbed her again.
sentences.chinese: 但每次他都又返回來刺她。

sentences.english: I saw her sitting in her car and I was joyous.
sentences.chinese: 每次看見她坐在車裏，我就心花怒放。

sentences.english: Raj: Can you even open your mouth without spewing a cultural stereotype?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼每次一張嘴吐出來的全是文化成見呢？

sentences.english: By the end of his shows, only a few iron beasts still move.
sentences.chinese: 每次表演結束，還能自己動彈的鐵武士就寥寥可數了。

definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
